name: 2002 Pokemon Expedition 39 Charizard Rev.Foil PSA 8 NM-MT (0x3d8c...9883)
description: RareMint Pokemon Genesis Mystery Pack (0x3d8caa40b8ed9ede07e2ee468ea9cf0fd5e8d7fd1c0f8678a76c8896608a9883) derived from the human readeable fingerprint of the physical item - which will be revealed at the same time as the NFT itself - using the Keccak256 cryptographic function. This unique identifier serves as a verifiable *Proof of Integrity* to certify that the corresponding physical asset is irrevocably associated to this NFT and vice-versa.
